configSchema.title: ConfigSchema

jurisdiction.description: Default jurisdiction (NSW, VIC, QLD, SA, TAS, ACT, NT)

configSchema.description: Session configuration for Tabcorp API credentials and preferences

capabilities.name: tab_oauth_password_grant
capabilities.description:
Obtain access and refresh tokens via password grant (for personal account betting).
        
        Args:
            client_id: Tabcorp OAuth client ID (from config if not provided)
            client_secret: Tabcorp OAuth client secret (from config if not provided)
            username: TAB account number (from config if not provided)
            password: TAB account password (from config if not provided)
        
        Returns:
            Dict containing access_token, refresh_token, expires_in, expires_at, token_type
        
        Raises:
            TabcorpAPIError: If authentication fails or credentials are invalid

capabilities.name: tab_oauth_refresh
capabilities.description:
Refresh access token using refresh_token grant.
        
        Args:
            refresh_token: The refresh token (from config if not provided)
            client_id: Tabcorp OAuth client ID (from config if not provided)
            client_secret: Tabcorp OAuth client secret (from config if not provided)
        
        Returns:
            Dict containing new access_token, refresh_token, expires_in, expires_at, token_type
        
        Raises:
            TabcorpAPIError: If token refresh fails

capabilities.name: tab_oauth_client_credentials
capabilities.description:
Obtain token via client_credentials grant (for public data, no account needed).
        
        Args:
            client_id: Tabcorp OAuth client ID (from config if not provided)
            client_secret: Tabcorp OAuth client secret (from config if not provided)
        
        Returns:
            Dict containing access_token, expires_in, expires_at, token_type
        
        Raises:
            TabcorpAPIError: If authentication fails

capabilities.name: racing_get_all_meeting_dates
capabilities.description: Get all available racing meeting dates including today, tomorrow, and futures.

capabilities.name: racing_get_meetings
capabilities.description:
Get all meetings for a specific date.
        
        Args:
            access_token: Bearer access token
            meeting_date: Date in YYYY-MM-DD format (e.g., '2025-10-29')
            jurisdiction: Jurisdiction code (NSW, VIC, etc.)

capabilities.name: racing_get_all_races_in_meeting
capabilities.description:
Get all races in a meeting.
        
        Args:
            race_type: R (Racing/Thoroughbred), H (Harness), G (Greyhounds)
            venue_mnemonic: Three-letter venue code (e.g., 'RAN' for Randwick)

capabilities.name: racing_get_race
capabilities.description: Get detailed information for a specific race including runners, odds, and pools.

capabilities.name: racing_get_next_to_go
capabilities.description: Get next-to-go races ordered by start time.

capabilities.name: racing_get_race_form
capabilities.description: Get comprehensive form guide for a race including all runners and their recent performance.

capabilities.name: racing_get_runner_form
capabilities.description: Get detailed form guide for a specific runner including past performances and statistics.

capabilities.name: racing_get_approximates
capabilities.description:
Get pool approximates for a race.
        
        Args:
            wagering_product: WIN, PLACE, QUINELLA, EXACTA, TRIFECTA, FIRST4, etc.

capabilities.name: racing_get_open_jackpots
capabilities.description: Get all currently open jackpots across all meetings.

capabilities.name: racing_get_jackpot_pools
capabilities.description: Get all jackpot pools for a specific date.

capabilities.name: sports_get_all_open
capabilities.description: Get all sports with at least one open or suspended market.

capabilities.name: sports_get_open_sport
capabilities.description:
Get a specific sport with open markets.
        
        Args:
            sport_name: e.g., 'Basketball', 'Rugby League', 'AFL', 'Tennis', 'Soccer'

capabilities.name: sports_get_open_competition
capabilities.description:
Get a specific competition with open markets.
        
        Args:
            sport_name: e.g., 'Basketball'
            competition_name: e.g., 'NBA', 'NBL'

capabilities.name: sports_get_open_tournament
capabilities.description: Get a specific tournament with open markets (e.g., ATP tournaments in Tennis).

capabilities.name: sports_get_open_match_in_competition
capabilities.description:
Get a specific match in a competition with open markets.
        
        Args:
            match_name: e.g., 'Lakers v Warriors'

capabilities.name: sports_get_open_match_in_tournament
capabilities.description: Get a specific match in a tournament with open markets.

capabilities.name: sports_get_next_to_go
capabilities.description: Get next-to-go sports matches sorted by start time with optional filters.

capabilities.name: sports_get_all_results
capabilities.description: Get all sports with at least one resulted market.

capabilities.name: sports_get_resulted_sport
capabilities.description: Get a specific sport with resulted markets.

capabilities.name: sports_get_resulted_competition
capabilities.description: Get a specific competition with resulted markets.

capabilities.name: sports_get_resulted_match_in_competition
capabilities.description: Get a specific match with results in a competition.

capabilities.name: footytab_get_all_rounds
capabilities.description:
Get all FootyTAB rounds for a sport.
        
        Args:
            sport_name: e.g., 'AFL', 'Rugby League', 'Rugby Union'

capabilities.name: footytab_get_round_details
capabilities.description:
Get FootyTAB round details for a specific round number.
        
        Args:
            series: Optional series name for sports with multiple series

capabilities.name: tab_get
capabilities.description:
Generic GET request to any Tabcorp API endpoint with bearer authentication.
        
        Args:
            path: API endpoint path (e.g., '/v1/tab-info-service/racing/dates')
            params: Optional query parameters
            jurisdiction: Optional jurisdiction override
        
        Use this for endpoints not covered by specialized tools.

capabilities.name: tab_post
capabilities.description:
Generic POST request to any Tabcorp API endpoint with bearer authentication.
        
        Args:
            path: API endpoint path
            body: Optional JSON request body
        
        Use this for placing bets or other POST operations.
